name: Chicken Zoodle Soup
author: bd.weld
summary: With the winter months approaching fast my niece and I co-conspired to come up with this warm and comforting soup using 'zoodles' that's easy on the waistline.
ingredients: ¾ pound cooked chicken breast, cut into bite sized pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
3  zucchini squash, cut into 'noodles' using a spiral slicer or vegetable peeler
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat
Saute onion, celery, and garlic in hot oil until just tender, about 5 minutes
Pour chicken broth into the pot; add carrots, chicken, basil, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper
Bring the broth to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer mixture until the vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes
Divide zucchini 'noodles' between six soup bowls; ladle broth mixture over the 'noodles
